column1: full, just outside off, angling away. Left alone
full, on middle and a bit of shape on this one. He prods forward to drive towards mid-on
length ball, wide outside off, and he flays this away off the front foot. Crunched through the covers for the day's first runs
length ball on leg, and flicked off his pads to the leg side. Fine leg runs across to intercept
length ball on middle, and angling into leg stump again. Worked off his pads to the leg side
full, on off, and he meets the ball on the front foot. Pushed back to Rubel
flicked! Full, on his pads, and he closes his bat's face to put this strayer away
too good a shot for just a single. Length ball, wide outside off, and he cuts this square but straight to point. Misfield allows for a single
length ball, wide enough for Stirling to throw his hands at it. Cut in front of square, and two men give the ball a mighty chase
back of a length, just outside off, and firmly punched off the back foot to cover
length ball, angling into his hips, and comfortably flicked off his pads to deep backward square
length ball, on off, and he prods forward to defend towards cover
length ball, on off, and shaping away after hitting the deck. McCollum doesn't commit, getting his bat out of the ball's way in time
huge lbw appeal but not given. Length ball, on middle and shaping towards off. Hits him in front of off, but the ball is probably going high. A bit of sound too, but unsure what that came from
full, on off, and he presses forward to defend to cover
length ball on middle, and going down leg
length ball, wide outside off, and punched to cover
fuller, just outside off and shaping away. McCollum tries to play the straight drive, but the ball whizzes past his outside edge
full on middle, and he works it away to midwicket. No chance of a single
full on off, and he walks across to the off side, before driving to mid-on. Stopped once again
hammered! Back of a length, just outside off, and he drags a pull into the stands. What a shot
full, on off, and he drives to mid-on once again. Misfield allows them to pinch a single

got him! Taken at first slip. Length ball, wide outside off and McCollum goes fishing. Tries to punch off the back foot, and this has taken the outside edge. Disappointing for the man who scored a hundred against Bangladesh in the A-game
full, on off, and defended back to Rubel
full, outside off, and smashed through to the off side. But a solid stop from the cover fielder ensures it's only a couple
shott! Full, wide outside off, and Stirling takes a big stride forward before clattering a front-foot cover drive to the boundary
full, on off, and tapped off the front foot to mid-off. The fielder intercepts
full, outside off, and swinging away. Left alone by Stirling
length ball, angling in, and worked away to midwicket
length ball, just outside off, and the attempted drive takes the bat's inside half and rolls away to the leg side. They scamper across for one
full, just outside off, and pushed off the front foot to cover. No run
slower ball, offcutter on off, and tapped off the back foot to mid-on. They race across for one
another offcutter, wide outside off, and he hammers a cut-shot. Finds point though
appeal for lbw but turned down. Length ball on middle, and angling in. Hits his knee roll but would've gone down leg for sure
pulled in front of square! Expecting the short ball, and Rubel hands him that. Stays on the back foot, and hoicks it over the cow-corner boundary
full, just outside off, and he creams a cover drive. Misfield by cover allows them to hare back for the second
nice and full on off, driven back but a good stop on his followthrough
shapes to drive but mistimes this back to the bowler
picture-perfect drive on the up, straight to extra cover
easy pickings! Strays onto the pads and he flicks behind square.
huge appeal for lbw but this one comes back in to hit high on the pad. Going down
touch ahead of length on off, defended
incoming length ball from wide of the crease, defended back
slower and fuller on off stump, defended with soft hands
stands tall and punches this length ball to the edge of the ring at extra cover
touch fuller, just around off, defended from the crease
lucky to get away with a full delivery on the pads, defended gently to mid-on. Stopped short of playing a full-blooded flick
slower and fuller on leg stump, defended
flayed on the up through cover point! Sat up nicely, had width and Balbirnie said 'thank you very much'
too much width outside off, wide called and rightly so. Losing his radar that time
gets half a stride in and bunts this length ball into the off side
defended back, bowler puts his left hand to stop on his followthrough
lovely on-drive but can't pick the gap, straight to mid-on
beaten as he looks to punch away from the body, hint of outswing and the length that nearly did him in
off a thick edge, a first slip would've gobbled it up for brunch. Instead, it flies to the third man boundary. Squared up, looked to play through midwicket but the ball tailed away late
thumped back, but disturbs the stumps at the bowler's end. Hit too straight
punches this length delivery to extra cover
slips in a length ball on middle, defended back
thumps this on the up to cover point
slower and fuller on the stumps, Stirling kept honest as he defends with soft hands
firm push but straight to cover
lovely shot! Oozing class and confidence. Can pay to watch. Width and he unfurls his wrists to pick the gap behind point
straighter and he works this into the gap at midwicket
keeps a touch low, defended back

end of a promising innings. And what a terrible way to go. Looks to take on the short ball but this doesn't come on and he's through with the stroke, cramped for room. Did he get a little globve on the way through to Mushfiqur? No conclusive proof. Given out so he has to go. Oh, there's no review. How unfortunate? Richard Kettleborough the umpire in question.
pacy first ball, defends from the crease
slips a full ball on the pads, flicked to deep square
defended from the crease
floats this full and across, left alone
chipped but just wide of midwicket
balance, poise and wrist work - all top notch as he whips this incoming length ball into the gap at midwicket. Quality
slower and fuller on the stumps, defended
gentle bunt down to square third man for an easy single
eased to long off
length ball, from around the wicket. Lands on middle, and punched to mid on
full, just outside off, and defended off the front foot to the bowler
length ball on off, and worked off his pads to the leg side
swept! Full, angling down his legs, and he goes down on one knee to sweep behind square
appeal for lbw, but not given. Tries to sweep again, but hits his legs and rolls away to short fine leg
full, on off, and defended to the bowler again. Drinks
length ball, on off, and tapped off the back foot to the leg side
slower ball, full on middle, and worked off his pads to midwicket on this occasion
full, just outside off, and he prods forward to defend to cover
length ball, on off, and tapped with soft hands towards the off side. They hare across for one. Nice, early call this time
slower ball, back of a length on off, and he smothers an on-side flick off the back foot
another offcutter to finish the over. Length ball outside off, and caressed through point
worked away to the leg side
length ball, from around the wicket, and landing on off. Flicked off the back foot to deep midwicket
fifty! Length ball on off, and turning into the batsman. Flicked away to the leg side. His 27th fifty-plus score
full, on off, and tapped straight back
length ball, outside off, and flat-batted down to long on for a single
drilled to wide long off
full, on off, and defended off the front foot to mid-on
length ball, on off, and punched to mid-off this time
full, on off, and driven to long on for a walking single
length ball, on leg, and nudged down to fine leg. Tamim intercepts
offcutter, on middle and hitting his knee roll. Tries to muscle it to the leg side, but the ball goes to cover instead
full, just outside off, and clattered to cover.
goes back and across to tuck it into the leg side
fired full, defended back
flatter one, punched back, good stop
lunges forward and smothers this
gets well forward and eases to mid-off
nurdled with the angle to long-on
length ball, punched on the up wide of mid-off
length ball on middle, defended
slower ball on middle, driven down to long-on
slants one across, he gets well forward and defends
slower length ball, punched back to the bowler
accurate stuff, short of length on middle, he stands tall and defends back
fired full, defended back
eased to long-on as they jog the single
steers this into the gap at point for an easy single
flatter one on middle and leg, whipped to deep midwicket
skids back in, keeps a touch low, pulled to deep square
makes room and lofts this inside-out to long-off where Sabbir puts down a chance on the dive. Was a split-second late to react. Dropped
dropped again, another life for Stirling! Three grabs at point but couldn't hold on. Saifuddin the fielder
eased with the spin to long-off
skids one through to beat the outside edge, played for the turn when there was none
hit on the pad as he attempts an audacious reverse sweep
turns this wide of midwicket
gets well forward and defends
slider back in from around the stumps, makes room and bunts into the covers
fetches the sweep from outside off, straight to short fine
eased wide of cover for a quick single
worked with the spin into the gap at square leg
drifting into middle and leg, tucked to short midwicket
slashed, but this one lands short of short third man. Deceived him in the air
drives but this one rolls off a thickish inside edge to short midwicket
eased down to long-on
makes room and slaps this into the gap between cover and mid-off. Too short, enough flight, sat up nicely.
calls two, but will get just one. Tossed up on middle and leg, flicked to deep midwicket
punches to long-off for an easy single
lunges forward to flick, gets a leading edge that rolls to cover
full, on leg, and flicked to deep backward square
full, wide outside off, and he takes a big stride forward to meet the ball. Mistimes the drive to cover
length ball, on off, and he mistimes a back-foot punch to long on
full, on off, and driven with the bat's closed face to mid-on
full, outside leg stump, and nudged to square leg
full, on off, and tapped down the ground to long on
full, on off, and defended with soft hands off the front foot
swept hard! Full, on leg, and he's quick to get down on one knee. Clattered behind square
full, just outside off, and driven down the ground to long on for a walking single
full, just outside off, and tapped with soft hands to cover. No chance of a run though
full, on off, and driven down the ground to long off for a walking single
tossed up, just outside off and turning into the left-hander. Driven to long on
full, on off, and nudged with the bat's closed face to mid on
full just outside off, and he goes down on one knee to sweep. Misses, and huge appeal for lbw from Shakib. But not given. Reckon, impact was outside off, but this was mighty close
length ball, just outside off, and turning in. Fended off the back foot
length ball, wide outside off and he rocks back to cut square. <b>Scythed<b> through extra cover
length ball, loosener just outside off. Punched through to extra cover
around the wicket, full outside off stump. Slapped to point, but straight to the fielder
length ball, wide outside off again, and punched to deep extra cover. They go for a dangerous second run, but safely completed because the throw from the deep was wayward
full, just outside off, and he reaches forward to drive. Through his shot too early. Mistimed to mid-off
width offered, length ball outside off, and Porterfield tries to cut. But the ball stays slightly low, and he under-edges the shot onto the pitch
slower ball, length ball outside off but holding its line after pitching. Porterfield tries to drive but the ball goes past his outside edge
full, just outside off, and he skips down the wicket to drive to long off
length ball, wide outside off, and cut square to the point boundary
length ball, wide outside off, and Porterfield backs away to cut. Stopped at cover
full on middle, and once again tries to play the sweep. Finds Tamim at short fine leg
full, just outside off, and a big stride forward to firmly defend
length ball on middle, and worked off his hips to square leg
driven hard to deep point
slower and fuller on middle and leg, defended
width and he slashes this behind point. Third man had no chance. Not all that bad a delivery
hits the deck with a length ball, defended
slower and fuller on the pads, worked wide of midwicket
forces this on the up to deep point
lunges forward and smothers this
flicked wide of midwicket
gets right behind the line as he defends
gets well forward and blocks
tossed up on off, eased to long-off
slips this down leg, rightly called wide
beaten as he shapes to cut one, skidded through
slips this length ball on middle and leg, tucked wide of square leg
whips this down to mid-on as they scamper a single
bunts this down to square third man
slower and fuller, driven straight to cover
heaved into the leg side, to deep backward square
slower length ball on middle and leg, tucks this all along to deep midwicket
nicely tossed up, eased to long-on
eases this to long-on to raise his half-century, his 16th in ODIs. First in 15 matches for Ireland
flighted on off, driven to cover
eases this to long-off as they jog the single
quicker delivery drifting into middle and leg, worked to long-on
gets the bat well in front of the pad as he blocks
can't pierce the gap, hits hard and straight to point
misses his mark by a bit, drilled to long-on
steers this shortish delivery to point
driven on the up to extra cover, looked to hit it over the infield
opens the bat face late to run it down to third man
good work by mid-off, throwing himself to his right to keep it down to a single. Jayed the fielder
smacks this behind point. It's the reverse sweep which he executes so well. Flatter and fuller, got on top of the bounce and used his malleable wrists to pick the gap
drills to deep cover
gets bat well in front of the pad as he blocks
driven with the spin to sweeper cover
slow turn, slips it down leg, wide called
slaps this straight to mid-off
punches back to the bowler
reaches out to carve this full delivery to deep cover
bunts this straight to point
angles a length ball back in, defended.
lucky to get away with one down leg, tickled straight to short fine
slaps this on the up to sweeper cover, excellent stop
in the air but safe! Slashes to get a thick outside edge that lands between backward point and square third man
right behind the line as he defends
flayed on the up to sweeper cover
gentle bunt into the off side for a quick single
swing and a miss outside off
short on middle, punched off the back foot to mid-off
run away to point
gets forward and bunts past cover
slaps this to sweeper cover
makes room and flays this straight to point
squared up by the length but somehow manages to defend back
defends this incoming length delivery
check-punched into the gap at cover
stunning timing as he uses the width to punch this behind point, Tamim comes around from third man to cut that off
in the slot and punished! Clean strike over mid-off
punched to sweeper cover
pulled wide of square leg. Didn't get proper bat on that, but spotted the opportunity for the second and made it, the fielder in the deep was caught napping
slower and fuller on off, driven to deep cover
up on his toes as he slashes this behind square to deep point
gentle bunt into the off side
pushes this down the ground for another single
pulled to fine leg, stayed low, fetched it from outside off
slashes down to square third man
makes room and looks to clobber over cover, can't pierce the off side
slower ball, looks to hoick but gets a thick inside edge to long-on
length ball, on off, and slapped away to deep extra cover for a single
yorker on middle, and shoveled down to long on. That's his first ton since March 2018
length ball, just outside off, and guided to third man for a walking single
length ball on off, and played to the off side for a single
yorker just outside off, and going through to the keeper
back of a length, slower ball on middle, and pulled along the ground to deep midwicket
swings across the line and clears midwicket! Length ball from around the wicket, and he flat-bats a pull for six
full on middle, but going down leg. Misses the flick, hits his pads and rolls down to fine leg
back of a length, just outside off, and he mistimes a cut to point
superlative! Full, on off and angling away. Porterfield frees his arms and slaps a shot through the cover region. Thumped
boy oh boy! Full on middle, and he clears his front leg before hammering a six over cow corner. Ireland beginning their charge
moves on to 90 with a cut to deep point
full, on off, and driven down to long off for a single
nice attempted yorker. Lands at the base of middle, and he toe-ends a drive to mid off
back of a length slower ball, lands on middle and goes over Porterfield's bat. Tried to pull, but couldn't get the connection
attempted yorker, on leg stump, and he mistimes a nudge to the leg side
low full toss on off, and cracked through the covers to the sweeper-fielder on the off side
low full toss on middle, and mistimed to long off for a single
low full toss, wide outside off, forcing Porterfield to stretch. Mistimed to long on
back of a length on off, and he backs away to make some room. Flat-bats a shot to long on, just a single

full outside off stump, and Porterfield walks across to the off side exposing all three stumps. Tries to drag a slog over midwicket, but the ball hits his leg and rolls away to the third-man boundary for four

holes out at extra cover! Falls just short of a hundred. This was full and wide outside off, and Porterfield tries to slap it over the off side. But fielder in the deep runs across the boundary line and slides across the grass to complete a catch. Excellent innings
full toss on middle, and flicked away to deep midwicket. One bounce to the fielder
length ball, just outside off, and nudged to the leg side. Vacant spaces there, allowing the duo to come back for the second
hammered over the bowler's head! Length ball, very wide outside off but Stirling does some stand-and-deliver hitting from the base of his crease
hello there! Length ball on middle, and he stays on the back foot before pulling over midwicket
excuse me! Length ball, wide outside off but Stirling swivels to smash a shot over the non-striker's head. Ball lost!
Shakib trying something different. Came from over the wicket, but bowls it too wide
see you later! Full, on leg, and Stirling sweeps this behind square! Man in the deep, but he's just a spectator
full, on leg, and drilled to long on
most expensive over off Shakib Al Hasan in ODI history! Full, on off, and he picks up a flicked shot to long on
back of a length, outside leg stump with KoB exposing his stumps. Bowler follows him, and all O'Brien can do is nudge it down to fine leg
slower ball, full on off, and Stirling goes for the big shot. Toe-ends it, and it's in the air for ages. Mashrafe from cover tries to run to take the catch, but the ball falls beyond him
full on leg, and the leg-side whip takes a leading edge to point. Stirling living dangerously
got him! Back of a length on middle, and O'Brien tries to flat-bat a six over long on. But he toe-ends the shot, and it's gone straight to the man riding the boundary
back of a length on middle, and soaring over Stirling's head. Wide given

back of the hand slower ball, and it lands full on leg stump. Stirling tries to muscle this over cow corner, but he doesn't have the power behind the shot. In the air for eternity before the sweeper-fielder on the leg side gets under it. Jayed strikes again. Standing ovation for Stirling
overpitched on off, and drilled to long on
back of a length, outside off and angling in. Adair stands tall, and pull over wide long on. Smoked it
slower ball, nearly a yorker on leg. And struck past the bowler. Impressive effort near the boundary - from Mahmudullah - saves two
another attempted yorker. Driven to long on once more
low full toss on middle, and off the mark immediately. Driven to long on
low full toss because of the attempted yorker. Drilled to long on
slower ball, length outside off, and he plays a late cut down to the third-man boundary
another one! Useful runs. Back of a length, trying to go short to Wilson, but he manages to hook a shot over short fine leg
Jayed has the last laugh! Full on middle, and the attempted cover drive is sliced to point. Five-wicket haul
full, on off, and lifted over the bowler's head. Fielder - Tamim - at long off does well to run across the boundary and intercept
full on leg, and flicked away to deep midwicket. They scamper across for one
yorker, just outside leg stump, and dug away to the bowler
nearly a yorker, full toss on middle, and hammered over the bowler's head. Protection in the deep though
full and wide outside off, but inside the tramlines! Terrific ball. Tidy three balls so far
hit wicket! Full, just outside off, and the attempted drive through the off side is missed. But Adair is so deep in his crease that he chops off stump with his bat
full toss on middle, and he tries to paddle it past fine leg. Deft touch down the leg side but the keeper dives across to intercept

bowled around his legs! Full on middle, and Dockrell exposes his stumps trying to play another paddle. Ball crashes into middle stump and Saifuddin bowls a tidy over to end the innings. Ireland finish on 292 for 8
length ball angling away, tucked into the leg side
length ball on middle and off, defended from the crease
nice and full on off, he gets a good stride in as he defends
once again solidly defended back
works this into the gap at midwicket to get off the mark
gets onto the front foot and squirts this into the off side
slips this length ball down leg, hits the keeper on the shin as he looks to collect it on the bounce
tucks this gently into the leg side
punched well but straight back to the bowler
poor ball, slips this down leg and he tickles this to beat fine leg. Easy pickings. Couldn't have asked for an easier delivery early in the innings
half-volley on the pads, flicked straight to midwicket
punched straight to extra cover
tucks this nicely off his hip behind square, down to long leg
down leg, looks to glances, may have brushed the pad along the way
length ball outside off, left alone
gets a good stride in and defends
rides the bounce and turns it back down the pitch
scorching extra cover drive! Didn't try to over-hit this half-volley, just opened the bat face a wee bit and laced it between cover and point
driven straight to cover point
slants a length balls across, defended from the crease
just a hint of width and he cracks this behind point. Terrific shot
slants one across the left-hander, watched through to the keeper
stands tall and punches it back to the bowler
driven straight to extra cover
midwicket dives over the ball, can't stop this flick
right behind the line as he defends
nice and full on off, he works this into the leg side
firm push down the ground, bisects mid-off and mid-on. Beautiful timing
firm push but can't pierce the gap at extra cover
steered down to square third man
uppish but doesn't carry, straight to cover point
struck on the pad as he looks to whip this across the line. Big appeal but replays confirm ball pitched outside leg
short-arm jab to midwicket
easy pickings, width and right in the slot for the cover drive. Beautifully done
goes right back and across as he defends
works this off his wrists into the gap behind square
wrists this length ball to midwicket
back of a length, just outside off, and fended away to the off side. Played with the bat's open face
full, just outside off, and the attempted leg-side clip takes a leading edge to cover
peach! Full, just outside off and the attempted front-foot defense misses the ball. Whizzes past his outside edge
full, on leg and it hits his pads while trying to flick. Rolls away to the leg side and they scamper across for one. Umpire reckons it came off his bat
full toss from around the wicket, but too wide outside off. Driven through the covers, but a fielder gets his hand to it
full, on off, and defended off the front foot to cover
yorker on leg stump, but flicked off his ankles to the backward-square boundary. Adair's diving effort not good enough
length ball on middle, and fended off the back foot
exquisite! Full, just outside off and he leans forward to drive through the covers! Shott
full, on off, and a bit of inswing on this occasion. Struck to mid off
full, on off, and he prods forward to block
knuckle ball, full on middle, and dug away to the leg side
back of a length, wide outside off, and punched off the back foot to cover
length ball on off, and guided down to third man for a walking single

dropped catch! Length ball from around the wicket, and Tamim goes fishing. Tries to play a late cut, but very nearly hits it straight to the keeper's gloves. Just past his left, and runs away for four
up and over! Fullish, wide outside off, and he gently lifts it over the off-side infielders
length ball, wide outside off, and he runs this down to third man for one
back of a length on off, and clipped off his hips to square leg
full, on off, and driven away from his body to cover
length ball, outside off and angling away. Tries to cut, but mistimes to point
length ball angling away, and Liton tries to slap a cut, but the ball stays low and goes through to the keeper on the bounce
short on off, but not fast enough to trouble an international batsman. Rides the bounce and cuts it over point for four
length ball, outside off, and cut away to point
chipped but lands safely. Offcutter outside off, and Liton is through his shot too early. Flies off the bat's edge, but nobody's there at short third man
length ball, just outside off, and chopped down to third man
length ball, just outside off, and angling away. Shoulders his arms
back of a length on leg, and he tiptoes to flick to square leg
too wide and punished by Liton. Width offered and cut square past the infield
full, on off, and blocked off the front foot
length ball angling in, and flicked off his hips to deep midwicket
full on leg, and angling further down. Tamim misses the flick, but still collects the free run
back of a length on middle, and worked off his waist to deep midwicket. Enough time to jog back for the second
back of a length on middle, and going over Tamim's head. Half-ducks under the ball
waited for the short ball, and this time he smacks this leg-side. Dockrell's in the deep, but the ball has gone through his fingers. D'oh!
length ball on off, and gently nudged to midwicket
gentle dab into the off side for a quick single
short of length on middle and leg, worked off his hip to deep square leg

slips this down leg, Tamim tickles this nice and fine. McCarthy gets around and puts in a dive to stop but the leg may have been touching the skirting as he pulled it back in. Josh Little has already signalled a boundary, so the third umpire won't have much to do here.
punched to sweeper cover
back of length on middle and leg, tucks this to deep square leg
gentle bunt into the leg side as they scamper a single
short of length on off, he gets well forward and defends
length ball on middle and leg, he hops across and works this down to long leg
dabs this behind the wicket as they scamper a quick single. Sensible cricket
uppish but safe, flicked nicely to deep midwicket
uppish but safe, flicked nicely to deep midwicket
short, sliding in and helped along the way to the fine leg boundary.
tucks this off his hip to fine leg
chops this down to third man
slips this on middle and leg, uses the pace to whip this to deep square leg
straying down leg, tickled to fine leg
tucks this wide of square leg
pulled over square leg, gets enough bat on it. Lovely timing, couple of bounces.
tucks this wide of square leg
makes room and deflects this to short third man
rocks back and cuts to sweeper cover
gets well forward and works this off the stumps wide of midwicket
driven with the spin to deep cover, poor work there. What should've been one is now two. Rankin nearly conceded a boundary there
played late, played nicely. Just a hint of width, he went back into the crease and dabbed this really nicely, off the keeper's gloves almost.
right besides the line as he defend
width and he flays this on the up behind point. Super timing
driven straight to cover
gets this to lift off the deck but it's down leg. Good take by the keeper
chopped on! Ireland needed one badly and they have one. Tamim with a feeble push away form the body
drives to get a thick outside edge to third man
leg side line and he steers this fine past the keeper. Easy
works this down to long-on
works this against the turn to midwicket
leading edge that rolls to cover
rocks back and cuts to short third man, lucky to get away with this short ball.
fired full on the stumps, blocked
squeezes the drive past cover, there's a misfield and they'll get a single
length ball, around the wicket, and cut square. Stopped at point
length ball, on off, and defended off the back foot to cover
full, on off, and driven to mid-off. Well intercepted by Rankin diving to his left
full on leg stump, but going further down. Gotta rebowl that
overpitched on leg, and flicked to fine leg for a walking single
full outside off, and he tries to press forward to drive. Misses the shot, ball goes past his outside edge to the keeper
tossed up, wide outside off, and drilled through to the cover boundary
full, just outside off, and tapped to the vacant off-side region. Enough time to come back for the second. Clever cricket
length ball, just outside off, and tapped to the off side for a quick single
full, on off, and driven down the ground
length ball on off, and turning in. Defended towards the leg side
full, wide enough for him to throw his arms. Slapped to wide long on, where McCarthy does well to keep it down to only two
length ball, wide outside off, and cut square to deep point
back of a length on leg, trying to go for the short ball. But wide called
full, on off, and Shakib covers his off stump before defending towards point
full on middle, and worked off his pads behind square on the leg side. Protection there though
what do we have here?! Back of a length on off from around the wicket, and a check-pull from Liton has taken a top-edge. Enough behind that shot to clear fine leg. Tiny, tiny ground here at Clontarf
back of a length, slower ball outside off. He mistimes a flat-batted shot to mid off
length ball, on off, and he guides a shot to third man. Chopped down to the fielder there
length ball, on off, and punched down the ground to long on
tossed up outside off, and Liton picks the length early. Hammers an inside-out cover drive through to the boundary
flighted again, full on off. Tapped to extra cover for one
quicker one, angling into his pads. Worked away to square leg
worked off his pads to square leg
length ball outside off, but turning inwards. Firmly struck off the back foot to long on for one
breakthrough! The stumps are broken. Liton 24 short of a hundred. Was a full ball, but slightly slower, and Liton's through his shot too early. Smart delivery
first-ball four! Overpitched on leg, and flicked off his toes to the leg-side fence
full, just wide outside off, and he toe-ends a drive to cover
length ball on middle, and he uncomfortably nudges a shot to the leg side. They scamper across for one
full, on off, and he toe-ends a drive to wide long off
length ball on off, and turning inwards. Punched to long on
length ball on middle, and worked off his waist to the vacant square-leg region
tossed up outside off, and driven straight back to the bowler
full on off, and driven down the ground to long on for a jogging single
length ball, wide outside off and turning away. Cut square to deep point
length ball on leg, and hits his front leg. But this is going down leg
full, just outside off, and he caresses a front-foot dive past mid-off's left
full, on off, and tapped with soft hands to point for a quick single
full on leg, and flicked to the leg side. But it takes a thick inside-edge off his bat and pad
back of a length on middle, and pulled along the ground to Dockrell in the deep
full, just outside off, and the slower ball is defended towards point. McCollum takes a tumble while trying to intercept
length ball from around the wicket. Lands just outside off, and fended off the back foot
length ball, just outside off, and he mistimes a punch towards the non-striker
length ball, just outside off, and pushed with the bat's open face to cover
length ball, just outside off, and fended off the back foot to cover. Enough time to pinch a single
length ball, just outside off, and tapped with the bat's open face to point
back of a length, wide outside off, and Mushfiqur tees up to cut. Struck super hard, but goes straight to the fielder at point. Unlucky
full and wide outside off, and he leans into a drive. Struck to deep extra cover
full on leg, and flicked nonchalantly off his legs. Fine leg runs across the boundary to try and cut it off, but even his diving effort isn't good enough
length ball, wide outside off, and cut to deep point. Shakib says no to the second run
length ball on middle, and he slices a cut to the sweeper-fielder on the off side
back of a length, wide outside off, and punched to cover point
length ball, outside off, and he muscles a cut to the fielder on the off-side boundary
slower ball punished! Ball holds up off the deck, and he frees his arms to hammer a cut for four
back of a length on middle, and pulled to Stirling at midwicket
full on middle, and angling down leg. Flicked to fine leg
drilled off the back foot! Length ball from around the wicket, but he meets the ball near his chest and strikes an easy four
length ball, just outside off, and he punches a shot to deep point
full on leg, and worked off his pads down to fine leg
length ball, width offered, and cut to the sweeper-fielder on the off side
full on middle, and he mistimes a straight drive. Stopped by Rankin on his followthrough
back of a length on leg, and nudged off his pads to the leg side
length ball, on leg, and flicked off his hips to fine leg
length ball, on off, and tapped to point. Mushi wants a single, but Shakib says no
through him! A bit of late inswing this time. Length ball snaking in from around the wicket, and very nearly clipped the top of off
full, on off, and driven with the bat's closed face down the ground. Races away to the long-on boundary
full, on off, and flicked to the leg side
length ball, just outside off, and guided off the back foot to third man for one
length ball, just outside off, and cut square off the back foot
runs this down to third man for a single
back of a length on middle, and pulled along the ground to fine leg
length ball on middle, and he gloves a shot to third man
cries of catch it but drops well short of fine leg. Top-edges a pull on this occasion
length ball, outside off, and cut to point
back of a length on middle, and he check-pulls along the ground. Pierces the gap between the two outfielders on the leg side, but the fielders manage to stop the ball from going for four
back of a length, outside leg stump, and going through to the keeper
length ball, on leg, and the ball hits his handle and runs down towards short fine leg
full, on off, and defended towards the off side. Gentle hands, they pinch a run
full on off, and tapped with soft hands towards point
tossed up, on off, and defended back to the bowler
length ball, wide enough outside off for Mushfiqur to free his arms. Cut to deep point
length ball, on off, and he flat-bats a pull. Straight back to the bowler
length ball, just outside off, and he carves a cut shot behind point. Man in the deep is just a spectator
back of a length, just outside off, and Mushfiqur sways away from the ball's line
length ball, on middle, and going down the leg side
length ball, on middle, and pulled along the ground to deep backward square. Races away. That's 5000 ODI runs as wicketkeeper as well
sharp take from the keeper! Breaks the partnership. Full on middle, and going down leg. Mushfiqur tries to flick, but it takes his glove and Wilson dives to his left to take a one-handed stunner
length ball on middle, and nudged off his hips to the leg side
full, on off, and tapped back to the bowler
full, on middle, and tapped towards the keeper. Nearly played on!
full, just outside off, and defended towards cover for a quick single
length ball, on off, and nudged off his pads to the leg side
full, on off, and defended back to the bowler
length ball, on off, and angling in. Punched with the bat's open face to the gap near deep extra cover
full, on off, and defended towards the leg side. They scamper across for one
full, on leg stump, and worked off his pads for a quick single
length ball, on off, and worked off his hips to the leg side
back of a length on off, and pulled behind square to deep backward square
good length, on off, and pulled to deep backward square
length ball, just outside off, and the attempted pull is inside-edged to point
pulled over deep midwicket! Back of a length, and he swivels to pull over the boundary-line
length ball, just outside off, and cut square to point
slower and fuller on off, pushed into the covers
flays this through to sweeper cover
beaten as he looks to steer this square
deflects off the thigh pad to the fine leg boundary, wanted to pull but missed
worked to deep midwicket as they jog the single
cut away down to square third man
beaten as he looks to ease this behind point
stands tall and defends
onto his toes as he works this off his hip to square leg
looked to pull, then sways out of it in the end, bunted behind for a single. Well-disguised slower bouncer
bunts this length ball into the offside
whips this down to deep square leg
slips this length ball down leg, some exercise for the umpire. Falls away as he looks to bang it in from wide of the crease
eased wide of point for an easy single
floated full on off, defended from the crease
dug in short, this is well above the batsman's head, wide called.
squared up but manages to hold his shape in defence
wrists this length delivery to midwicket
slower and fuller outside off, squeezed down to third man
pulled in front of square to Dockrell at deep midwicket
punches this straight to point
plays the short-arm jab down to deep square
short down leg and he helps this along to the fine leg boundary. Easy pickings.
bails out of this stroke as he looks to pull, wide called
width and he crashes this to the point boundary. Tracer bullet stuff. Buffet ball, Mosaddek was waiting for this
works this down to deep midwicket
genuine edge, healthy edge but there's no slip. Races to the third man boundary
pulled down to deep midwicket
scorching drive to sweeper cover
driven firmly to deep cover again, lovely shape, lovely timing.
slower ball outside off, bunts this to third man
pulled all along the ground to deep square
bails out of this short ball
pulls to midwicket
steered to third man
full on the pads, tucked to fine leg
healthy nick and gone! Was looking to guide this down to third man, instead picks out the keeper who takes an excellent catch. Second ODI wicket for Adair.
touch ahead of good length outside off, left alone
defended from the crease
sees the flight, drives hard to sweeper cover
drifting into middle, defended back
eased down to long-off
new ball, please. He's deposited this over the sightscreen. Lovely sashay down the pitch to meet this on the half-volley as he muscled this away.
drilled to sweeper cover
eased down to long-off
length ball on off, defended
eased down the ground
steered to square third man for an easy single
chops this to point
gentle bunt for a single

that's the end of that, steps out and hoicks this across the line to the wide long-on boundary. That's the end of that. Ireland are winless at the end of the tri-series, Bangladesh have made light work of this target.
